languages.text: {n}Лица высших офицеров светятся неподдельным счастьем. Выступив вперед, Данрок чинно произносит:{/n} "Добро пожаловать на мостик, Лорд-капитан. Мы, как и весь экипаж, с восторгом приветствуем ваше возвращение и благодарим Императора за него".

traits.locale_text: {n}Лица высших офицеров светятся неподдельным счастьем. Выступив вперед, Данрок чинно произносит:{/n} "Добро пожаловать на мостик, Лорд-капитан. Мы, как и весь экипаж, с восторгом приветствуем ваше возвращение и благодарим Императора за него".
traits.speaker: HighFactotum

languages.text: {n}The high-ranking officers beam with genuine happiness. Danrok steps forward and solemnly says,{/n} "Welcome to the bridge, Lord Captain. Like the rest of the crew, we are overjoyed by your return and thank the Emperor for it."
languages.original_text: {n}Лица высших офицеров светятся неподдельным счастьем. Выступив вперед, Данрок чинно произносит:{/n} "Добро пожаловать на мостик, Лорд-капитан. Мы, как и весь экипаж, с восторгом приветствуем ваше возвращение и благодарим Императора за него".

traits.locale_text: {n}The high-ranking officers are beaming with genuine joy. Danrok steps forward and says solemnly,{/n} "Welcome to the bridge, Lord Captain. We and the rest of the crew are overjoyed by your return and grateful to the Emperor for it."
traits.speaker: HighFactotum

traits.locale_text: {n}The high-ranking officers are beaming with genuine joy. Danrok steps forward and says solemnly,{/n} "Welcome to the bridge, Lord Captain. We and the rest of the crew are overjoyed by your return and grateful to the Emperor for it."
traits.speaker: HighFactotum

traits.locale_text: {n}The high-ranking officers beam with genuine happiness. Danrok steps forward and solemnly says,{/n} "Welcome to the bridge, Lord Captain. Like the rest of the crew, we are overjoyed by your return and thank the Emperor for it."
traits.speaker: HighFactotum

traits.locale_text: {n}The high-ranking officers beam with genuine happiness. Danrok steps forward and solemnly says,{/n} "Welcome to the bridge, Lord Captain. Like the rest of the crew, we are overjoyed by your return and thank the Emperor for it."
traits.speaker: HighFactotum

traits.locale_text: {n}The high-ranking officers beam with genuine happiness. Danrok steps forward and solemnly says,{/n} "Welcome to the bridge, Lord Captain. Like the rest of the crew, we are overjoyed by your return and thank the Emperor for it."
traits.speaker: HighFactotum

traits.locale_text: {n}The high-ranking officers beam with genuine happiness. Danrok steps forward and solemnly says,{/n} "Welcome to the bridge, Lord Captain. Like the rest of the crew, we are overjoyed by your return and thank the Emperor for it."
traits.speaker: HighFactotum

languages.text: {n}Los altos mandos rebosan de genuina felicidad. Danrok da un paso al frente y se dirige a ti con solemnidad:{/n} «Bienvenido al puente, Lord Capitán. Como al resto de la tripulación, nos llena de alegría que haya regresado y damos gracias al Emperador por ello».
languages.original_text: {n}The high-ranking officers beam with genuine happiness. Danrok steps forward and solemnly says,{/n} "Welcome to the bridge, Lord Captain. Like the rest of the crew, we are overjoyed by your return and thank the Emperor for it."

traits.locale_text: {n}Los altos mandos rebosan de genuina felicidad. Danrok da un paso al frente y se dirige a ti con solemnidad:{/n} «Bienvenido al puente, Lord Capitán. Como al resto de la tripulación, nos llena de alegría que haya regresado y damos gracias al Emperador por ello».
traits.speaker: HighFactotum

languages.text: {n}所有高级军官露出了发自内心的喜悦笑容。丹罗克走上前来，庄严地开了口。{/n}“欢迎回到舰桥，舰长大人。我们同全体船员，对您的归来表示万分喜悦。感谢帝皇保佑您安然归来。”
languages.original_text: {n}The high-ranking officers beam with genuine happiness. Danrok steps forward and solemnly says,{/n} "Welcome to the bridge, Lord Captain. Like the rest of the crew, we are overjoyed by your return and thank the Emperor for it."

traits.locale_text: {n}所有高级军官露出了发自内心的喜悦笑容。丹罗克走上前来，庄严地开了口。{/n}“欢迎回到舰桥，舰长大人。我们同全体船员，对您的归来表示万分喜悦。感谢帝皇保佑您安然归来。”
traits.speaker: HighFactotum

languages.text: {n}Clairement heureux, les officiers supérieurs sourient de toutes leurs dents. Danrok s'avance et vous déclare sur un ton solennel :{/n} « Bienvenue sur la passerelle, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}. Tout comme le reste de l'équipage, nous nous réjouissons de votre retour et en remercions l'Empereur. »
languages.original_text: {n}The high-ranking officers beam with genuine happiness. Danrok steps forward and solemnly says,{/n} "Welcome to the bridge, Lord Captain. Like the rest of the crew, we are overjoyed by your return and thank the Emperor for it."

traits.locale_text: {n}Clairement heureux, les officiers supérieurs sourient de toutes leurs dents. Danrok s'avance et vous déclare sur un ton solennel :{/n} « Bienvenue sur la passerelle, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}. Tout comme le reste de l'équipage, nous nous réjouissons de votre retour et en remercions l'Empereur. »
traits.speaker: HighFactotum

languages.text: {n}上級将校たちは心から喜んで顔をほころばせる。ダンロックが一歩前に進み、厳かに告げる。{/n}「ブリッジへようこそ、ロード・キャプテン。他の乗組員同様、あなたの帰還を心から喜び、皇帝に感謝します」
languages.original_text: {n}The high-ranking officers beam with genuine happiness. Danrok steps forward and solemnly says,{/n} "Welcome to the bridge, Lord Captain. Like the rest of the crew, we are overjoyed by your return and thank the Emperor for it."

traits.locale_text: {n}上級将校たちは心から喜んで顔をほころばせる。ダンロックが一歩前に進み、厳かに告げる。{/n}「ブリッジへようこそ、ロード・キャプテン。他の乗組員同様、あなたの帰還を心から喜び、皇帝に感謝します」
traits.speaker: HighFactotum

languages.text: {n}Die hochrangigen Offiziere strahlen vor ehrlichem Glück. Danrok tritt vor und sagt feierlich:{/n} "Willkommen auf der Brücke, Lord Captain. Wie der Rest der Crew sind auch wir überglücklich über Eure Rückkehr und danken dem Imperator dafür."
languages.original_text: {n}The high-ranking officers beam with genuine happiness. Danrok steps forward and solemnly says,{/n} "Welcome to the bridge, Lord Captain. Like the rest of the crew, we are overjoyed by your return and thank the Emperor for it."

traits.locale_text: {n}Die hochrangigen Offiziere strahlen vor ehrlichem Glück. Danrok tritt vor und sagt feierlich:{/n} "Willkommen auf der Brücke, Lord Captain. Wie der Rest der Crew sind auch wir überglücklich über Eure Rückkehr und danken dem Imperator dafür."
traits.speaker: HighFactotum

languages.text: {n}Yüksek rütbeli subaylar, saf bir mutlulukla havalara uçuyor. Danrok, ileri doğru bir adım atıp ciddiyetle konuşuyor.{/n} "Köprüye hoş geldiniz Lord Kaptan. Mürettebattaki herkes gibi biz de geri döndüğünüz için çok mutluyuz ve İmparator'a müteşekkiriz."
languages.original_text: {n}The high-ranking officers beam with genuine happiness. Danrok steps forward and solemnly says,{/n} "Welcome to the bridge, Lord Captain. Like the rest of the crew, we are overjoyed by your return and thank the Emperor for it."

traits.locale_text: {n}Yüksek rütbeli subaylar saf bir mutlulukla havalara uçuyor. Danrok, ileri doğru bir adım atıyor ve ciddiyetle şöyle diyor:{/n} "Köprüye hoş geldiniz Lord Kaptan. Tayfanın geri kalanı gibi bizler de geri döndüğünüz için çok mutluyuz ve İmparator'a müteşekkiriz."
traits.speaker: HighFactotum
